description: The David Henry Memorial Scholarship is open to declared Marketing (Marketing or Professional Selling) majors who are permanent residents of Oklahoma. Eligibility Requirements Declared Marketing (Marketing or Professional Selling) majors Permanent Oklahoma residents

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Marketing   or SIS_Major_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling   or SIS_Major is Marketing   or SIS_Major is Marketing-Professional Selling   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Marketing   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Marketing   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Marketing   or SIS_Major_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling   or SIS_Major is Marketing   or SIS_Major is Marketing-Professional Selling   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Marketing   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Marketing   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Marketing-Professional Selling
